configuration.title: px2rem+ configuration
configuration.base.description: The base pixel size for px convert to rem. This can be overridden inline.
configuration.precision.description: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point
configuration.leadingZero.description: Keep the leading zero for converted values < 1. E.g. 0.5rem (preserved) vs .5rem (not preserved)
configuration.twoWayConversion.descripti: Support to convert rem to px, using the base pixel size, but only in autocomplete.
command.convert.title: Convert to rem
command.settings.title: Set base pixel size
